entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:29 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:53 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 1:53 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 2.
